amendment.description: To set aside funds made available for Texas Statewide ITS Deployment and Integration for the deployment and integration of Intelligent Transportation Systems at Port of Galveston, Texas, and City of Lubbock, Texas.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1954 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1954 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Hutchison. (consideration: CR S13121-13122; text: CR S13121) To set aside funds made available for Texas Statewide ITS Deployment and Integration for the deployment and integration of Intelligent Transportation Systems at Port of Galveston, Texas, and City of Lubbock, Texas.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1954 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1954 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Hutchison.
